bibl.title: The Formulae of the Petrie Wills.
Studies in Memory of Zbigniew Borkowski
bibl.author: OATES, John F.

bibl.note: The formulaic elements and the structure of the wills. The inconsistent use of the formulae illustrates the uncertainties of the Greek community in the Fayum in the third century B.C.
OATES John F., The Formulae of the Petrie Wills.
Studies in Memory of Zbigniew Borkowski = JJurP 23 (1993) pp. 125-132, 1 tabl.
